TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AuthenticationLevel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies client requirements for authentication and impersonation when using the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class and derived classes to request a resource.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel MutualAuthRequested = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The client and server should be authenticated. The request does not fail if the server is not authenticated. To determine whether mutual authentication occurred, check the value of the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel MutualAuthRequired = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The client and server should be authenticated. If the server is not authenticated, your application will receive an with a <xref:System.Net.ProtocolViolationException> inner exception that indicates that mutual authentication failed

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Security.AuthenticationLevel None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No authentication is required for the client and server.
